Small town. During the month of January, they have a four day celebration for the virgin mary (begins January 11). Celebration includes musica de banda, bull riding, fireworks, bailes, and a three day carnival. During this time you will find  many friends and families throughout the main street walking around.

Please the people of the ranch.
The town has an outstanding and cultural church
At the beginning of every January, this small town has incredible, tradtional festivals for the Virgin de Guadalupe.
The town is nearby to many local cities including Erongaricuaro, Patzcuaro, and Quiroga
